title: Washington Freedom
body:
Washington Freedom have released their new kit ahead of the Major League Cricket season.

The team will be captained by Steve Smith. The Washington Freedon will start their opening fixture against MI New York on July 6.

Infinite is the official sponsor of this kit, while Freedom and Zyter TruCare are the title sponsors.
summary:
* The Washington Freedom team has unveiled its new kit for the upcoming Major League Cricket season.
* Steve Smith will captain the Washington Freedom team.
* The team's opening fixture is scheduled for July 6 against MI New York.
* Infinite is the official sponsor of the kit, while Freedom and Zyter TruCare are the title sponsors of the team.
